name: Guacari Drops
description:
Guacari drops is a platformer that will make us go in a great adventure with Tita, a water drop whose mission is to feed the heart of guacari's tree roots, but she has to have a lot of care, there's enemyes and obstacles that will difficult the mission.

Controls: 

  • Movement: AD or arrows
  • Jump:  Space Bar
  • Liana: To use and stop to use the liana use Space Bar.  To move keep pressing the same movement controllers

The team:
